channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 瑙鲁移交给中国，台湾失去大选后第一个盟友
item.description: Nauru will sever diplomatic relations with Taiwan and recognise China, the government of the small Pacific Islands nation said on Monday, marking Taipei's first diplomatic ally to switch to Beijing following a presidential election.翻译:太平洋小国瑙鲁政府周一表示，瑙鲁将与台湾断绝外交关系并承认中国，这是台北在总统选举后第一个转向北京的外交盟友。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 日本企业预计中国2024年经济前景依然严峻
item.description: Japanese firms in China expect economic prospects in the world's second-largest economy to remain grim this year, according to a report from the Japanese Chamber of Commerce and Industry in China released on Monday.翻译:中国日本商工会议所周一发布的一份报告显示，在华日本企业预计今年世界第二大经济体的经济前景依然严峻。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 阿拉斯加事故后，波音 737 MAX 向中国的交付面临新的延误 - 华尔街日报
item.description: Boeing faces a fresh delay in the resumption of deliveries of 737 MAX jets to China after the mid-air blowout of a panel on an Alaska Airlines MAX 9 this month, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday.翻译:据《华尔街日报》周日报道，本月阿拉斯加航空 MAX 9 飞机的一块面板在空中爆炸后，波音公司在恢复向中国交付 737 MAX 飞机方面面临着新的延迟。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 解释者：朝鲜为什么要测试高超音速导弹以及它们是如何工作的？
item.description: North Korea said on Monday it had tested a new solid-fuel hypersonic missile with intermediate range, amid an intensifying race for the next generation of long-range rockets that are difficult to detect and intercept.翻译:朝鲜周一表示，在对难以探测和拦截的下一代远程火箭的激烈竞争中，它已经测试了一种新型中程固体燃料高超音速导弹。
item.author: Hyonhee Shin

item.title: 中国呼吁召开加沙和平会议；哈马斯将透露以色列人质的命运
item.description: China called for a large-scale and authoritative peace conference on the war in Gaza, while the militant group Hamas aired video of three Israeli hostages and said their fate would be disclosed on Monday.翻译:中国呼吁就加沙战争召开大规模、权威的和平会议，而激进组织哈马斯则播放了三名以色列人质的视频，并表示他们的命运将于周一公布。
item.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Fadi Shana

item.title: 早盘竞价：市场应对北京对台湾的不满
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole翻译:韦恩·科尔 (Wayne Cole) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国光大集团前董事长因涉嫌腐败被捕 - 官方媒体
item.description: A former chairman of state-owned financial conglomerate China Everbright Group, Tang Shuangning, was arrested on suspicion of taking bribes and corruption, state media reported on Monday, citing China’s top prosecutor.翻译:官方媒体周一援引中国最高检察官的消息称，国有金融集团中国光大集团前董事长唐双宁因涉嫌受贿和腐败被捕。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国前官员称对台湾的承诺“坚如磐石”
item.description: The United States looks forward to continuity in the Taiwan-U.S. relationship under the new Taiwanese administration and the U.S. commitment to the island is "rock solid", a former senior U.S. official told Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen on Monday.翻译:一位前美国高级官员周一对台湾总统蔡英文表示，美国期待台湾新政府领导下的台美关系保持连续性，并且美国对台湾的承诺“坚如磐石”。
item.author: Ben Blanchard, Fabian Hamacher

item.title: 新疆雪崩滞留游客被直升机救起
item.description: Some tourists stranded for several days after avalanches hit highways leading to a popular winter tourism area in China's northwest region of Xinjiang were lifted by helicopter to safety, according to local media reports on Sunday.翻译:据当地媒体周日报道，通往中国西北地区新疆热门冬季旅游区的高速公路遭遇雪崩，一些滞留数天的游客被直升机送往安全地带。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚洲股市落后于日经指数的上涨，中国跳过降息
item.description: There was limited reaction to the ruling party's victory in Taiwan, which essentially left the status-quo intact.翻译:执政党在台湾获胜的反应有限，基本上维持了现状。
item.author: Wayne Cole

item.title: 独家：中国军方和政府不顾美国禁令采购英伟达芯片
item.description: The graphic processing units built by Nvidia are seen as superior to rival products for AI work as they can more efficiently process huge amounts of data needed for machine-learning tasks.翻译:Nvidia 构建的图形处理单元被认为优于人工智能工作的竞争对手产品，因为它们可以更有效地处理机器学习任务所需的大量数据。
item.author: Eduardo Baptista

item.title: 瑞士外交官表示，结束乌克兰战争需要俄罗斯的盟友中国
item.description: Ukraine pushed ahead with its peace formula to end nearly two years of war with Russia with a meeting of national security advisers from around the world at the World Economic Forum in Davos.翻译:乌克兰在达沃斯世界经济论坛上召开了来自世界各地的国家安全顾问会议，推动其和平方案结束与俄罗斯近两年的战争。
item.author: Victoria Waldersee

item.title: 中国外交官谴责外国政府就台湾大选后发表的言论
item.description: China's foreign ministry and its embassies around the world condemned foreign governments that congratulated Taiwan's Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) and its president-elect Lai Ching-te after an election on Saturday.翻译:中国外交部及其驻世界各地的大使馆谴责外国政府在周六选举后祝贺台湾民进党及其当选总统赖清德。
item.author: Eduardo Baptista

item.title: 台湾新总统面临中国压力，未获得多数席位
item.description: Lai Ching-te won by a comfortable margin though with less than half the vote, but his party lost control of parliament on which the president-elect will have to rely to pass legislation and spending.翻译:赖清德虽然以不到一半的选票以微弱优势获胜，但他的政党失去了对议会的控制权，当选总统将不得不依靠议会来通过立法和支出。
item.author: Yimou Lee, Sarah Wu, James Pomfret

item.title: 中方反对日方向台湾当选总统贺电
item.description: The Chinese embassy in Japan said on Sunday that it "resolutely opposed" Japanese Foreign Minister Yoko Kamikawa's statement congratulating Taiwan's new president-elect Lai Ching-te.翻译:中国驻日本大使馆周日表示，“坚决反对”日本外务大臣上川洋子祝贺台湾新当选总统赖清德的声明。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾新当选总统赖清德将面临中国的愤怒
item.description: Lai repeatedly said during the campaign that he wanted to keep the status quo with China, and offered to talk to Beijing. But in Beijing's view, he is a separatist and a "troublemaker through and through."翻译:赖在竞选期间多次表示，他希望与中国保持现状，并提出与北京对话。但在北京看来，他是一个分裂主义者，是一个“彻头彻尾的麻烦制造者”。
item.author: Ben Blanchard

item.title: 西藏不是焦点，镇压持续存在：流亡前领导人
item.description: The plight of Tibet has become less discussed internationally but repression continues and China is applying what it did there to other regions, a former head of the Tibetan government-in-exile said on Saturday.翻译:西藏流亡政府前领导人周六表示，国际上对西藏困境的讨论越来越少，但镇压仍在继续，中国正在将其在其他地区的做法应用到其他地区。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 布林肯与中国官员讨论人权、台海问题
item.description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Friday raised concerns over China's human rights issues in a meeting with senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington, the State Department said, adding they also discussed "maintaining peace and stability" in the Taiwan Strait.翻译:美国国务院表示，美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯周五在华盛顿会见中国高级官员刘建超时表达了对中国人权问题的担忧，并补充说，他们还讨论了“维护台湾海峡的和平与稳定”。
item.author: Kanishka Singh

item.title: 台湾选民拒绝中国，执政党获得第三个总统任期
item.description: Lai Ching-te's party, which champions Taiwan's separate identity and rejects China's territorial claims, was seeking a third term. Beijing framed the elections as a choice between war and peace.翻译:赖清德领导的政党主张台湾的独立身份，拒绝中国的领土主张，正在寻求第三次连任。北京将这次选举视为战争与和平之间的选择。
item.author: Yimou Lee, Sarah Wu

item.title: 中国2023年银行贷款创历史新高，但经济仍举步维艰
item.description: New bank lending in China rose less than expected in December, but 2023 lending hit a new record as the central bank kept policy accommodative to support an unexpectedly shaky economic recovery.翻译:12 月份中国新增银行贷款增幅低于预期，但由于央行保持宽松政策以支持意外不稳定的经济复苏，2023 年贷款创下新纪录。
item.author: Judy Hua, Kevin Yao
